markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis At the palace, I encountered [Nirro](/nirroCantaNicese/), a representative of the Vailian Trading Company. It seems like the Vailians have a strong presence in the region. It may be worth my time to make contact at their headquarters. ## Walkthrough * This quest is an introduction to the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) questline. It is started automatically upon first entering [Kahanga Palace](/kahangaPalace/) in [Serpent's Crown](/serpentsCrown/), after the meeting between various faction representatives. [Pallegina](/pallegina/) is present, alongside [Nirro, Canta Nicese](/nirroCantaNicese/) - a delegate of the VTC. ** You may choose to recruit Pallegina after the meeting, otherwise she will be found on the lower floor of the VTC HQ. ** The [RDC](/royalDeadfireCompany/) equivalent of this quest - [The Brass Empire](/theBrassEmpire/), and the next main quest [A Distant Light](/aDistantLight/) is started at the same time. * The quest directs you to the [Vailian Trading Company Headquarters](/vailianTradingCompanyHeadquarters/) in [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/). Speaking to either [Lueva Alvari](/luevaAlvari/) on the ground floor, or [Ignato Castol](/ignatoCastol/) on the top floor (he might not be present, depending on your current progress on other quest lines) will complete the quest, leading onto the quests [Terms of Trade](/termsOfTrade/), and the overarching quest [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_VTC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_VTC00_Meet_VTC.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''For the Republics!''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | At the palace, I encountered Nirro, a representative of the Vailian Trading Company. It seems like the Vailians have a strong presence in the region. It may be worth my time to make contact at their headquarters. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Meet with the director at the Vailian Trading Company offices.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | The Vailian Trading Company has a base of operations in the Queen's Berth district of Neketaka. If I'm going to speak with someone in charge, that's the place to start. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I met with Lueva Alvari, second in command at the Vailian Trading Company. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I met with Ignato Castol, director of the Vailian Trading Company. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | I killed a major official of the Vailian Trading Company. I doubt they'll be willing to work with me now. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003 | I have made an enemy of the Vailian Trading Company. I doubt they'll be willing to work with me now. |}
